inclusion.criterion: volunteering to participate in the study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: having mental confusion or any psychiatric problem caregiver
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient is a 62-year-old male with multiple comorbidities, including neurogenic bladder and recurrent UTIs. He has a non-obstructing stone in the L ureter and significant leaking around the suprapubic cath site.
